name: Edict Stormblaster
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor arc to weapons and engines, dealing %s of the energy damage and %s of the EMP damage dealt by the original hit.

name: Lethargy Autolance
tags: pd9, beam6, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_drop_salvage, no_dealer, codex_unlockable
customPrimary: Fires beams with no travel time. Hits damp the target's velocity, instantly reducing current speed. %s of damage dealt builds %s against shields, the remainder is dealt as soft flux. Damping effect is reduced to half on shield hits.

name: Chalice Area Denial Emitter
tags: utility18, missile17, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_drop_salvage, no_dealer, codex_unlockable
customPrimary: During chargeup, fires a stream of energy bolts at targets in range dealing %s points of %s damage on hit for %s additional DPS. Bolt fire rate is affected by missile fire rate modifiers.
customAncillary: Fires slow-moving energy mines that explode shortly after a target enters their proximity. Can't be disarmed by EMP emitters and ignores flares.

name: Hexdagger EML
customPrimary: Automatically fires while fully phased if there are hostiles in range.

name: Balefire EML
customPrimary: Can't be manually fired. If on autofire, automatically fires a burst when using the ship's system.

name: Discharge
customPrimary: Fires an EMP arc at the nearest target close to the weapon's current facing. The arc always hits.

name: Devastator Cannon
customPrimary:
Each shell has a fuse set to explode at a random distance, resulting in a barrage that's increasingly more deadly at closer ranges.

Will target missiles if no other targets are in range.
